scripts.watchmanErr: echo 999999 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_user_watches && echo 999999 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_queued_events && echo 999999 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_user_instances && watchman shutdown-server && sudo sysctl -p
scripts.errWhenStart: yarn run buildErr && yarn run watchmanErr
scripts.web:build:vendor-dev: rm -rf web/vendor-dev; NODE_ENV=development webpack --config web/vendor.webpack.config.js || rm -rf web/vendor-dev
scripts.web: [ -d web/vendor-dev ] || npm run web:build:vendor-dev && NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server -d --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000 --config web/webpack.config.js --inline --hot --colors
scripts.web:build: npm run web:build:vendor && npm run web:build:app
scripts.prestart: yarn run rn-kill && yarn run rn-watch && echo 'prestart end -------'
scripts.android: adb devices && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js run-android
scripts.rn-kill: rm -rf dist && kill -s 9 `lsof -i:8081 | sed '1d' | awk '{print $2}'` | echo 'kill 8081:result:' && ps -ef | egrep 'tsc|cli.js'| awk '{print $2}'| xargs kill | echo 'kill tsc,cli.js result:'
scripts.clear: rm -rf node_modules && rm yarn.lock && rm -rf dist
